title.native: キボウノチカラ～オトナプリキュア'23～

description:
One of the anime projects to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Precure franchise, this sequel will show characters from Yes! Precure 5, Yes! Precure 5 GoGo! and Futari wa Precure: Splash☆Star as grown-ups.

Nozomi Yumehara was an ordinary middle school student until she met the mysterious fairy Coco. She became the Precure of Hope, Cure Dream, and fought alongside her friends. Years later, Nozomi and her friends are now adults, busy with work, friends, family, and the stress that adult life brings. As the mysterious Shadows appear and attack humans, Nozomi and her friends embark on a new saga.

(Source: Anime News Network, Crunchyroll, edited)

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: Office Lady
tags.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東堂いづみ) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izumi_Todo)

Izumi Toudou is a collective pseudonym for [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s staff.
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浜名孝行)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/naokisato_face) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1hlpldRj6GZ2naD4XDqi80)

Naoki Sato is a Japanese composer and producer who has provided the music for several popular anime series. He was born on May 2, 1970 and graduated in Chiba Prefecture and Tokyo College of Music. At the 29th Japanese Academy Awards in 2006, he won the Best Music prize for his work on the film Always Sanchōme no Yuhi.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/waka_fuumi)

A regular presence in the [Precure](https://anilist.co/anime/603/) franchise since its beginning.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/稲上晃)

Affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/).
[Official Website](http://www.uchiyae.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yaedon) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yukauchiyae/)

**Height:** 155cm

[Blog](https://ameblo.jp/kanakomiyamoto) | [Twitter](https://x.com/MiyaKana1104)

[Profile (bransic)](https://bransic.net/composer_musician/misaki-umase) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/UmaseMisaki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/umasemisaki/) | [Threads](https://www.threads.net/@umasemisaki) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5ZorNjW9rIlOHlhmIIZ2tQ) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/misaki-umase/1455312345) | [Deezer](https://www.deezer.com/artist/61028472)
Also the composer for the video game Phantom Kingdom.

Mayu Kudou is a Japanese singer. Since performing the opening theme of [Yes! Precure 5](https://anilist.co/anime/1932), she has been a prominent voice in the Precure franchise. She was in Jazz Vocal Unit called Harajuku BJ Girls (Chix Chicks) in 2005-2010.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tadanonatsu)__

Natsumi Tadano is a Japanese lyricist.

Graduated: Hitotsubashi University (Faculty of Sociology)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mizunoyoshiki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/水野良樹)

Leader and member of the band [Ikimono-gakari](https://anilist.co/staff/102277).

__[Official Site](https://ikimonogakari.com/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCflAJoghlGeSkdz5eNIl-sg)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/IKIMONOofficial)__

__ikimono-gakari__ (いきものがかり) is a Japanese rock band. They record on Sony Music Japan's EPIC Records label.  The band was formed in Kanagawa Prefecture in February 1999 by Hotaka Yamashita and [Yoshiki Mizuno](https://anilist.co/staff/168854/Yoshiki-Mizuno), and was later joined by lead vocalist [Kiyoe Yoshioka](https://anilist.co/staff/159004) in December the same year. Hotaka Yamashita later left the band as of July 2021.

Graduated: Hitotsubashi University (Faculty of Sociology)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mizunoyoshiki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/水野良樹)

Leader and member of the band [Ikimono-gakari](https://anilist.co/staff/102277).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yoshiyama_yuu)

She got her start at Studio Muu under [Hiromi Muranaka](https://anilist.co/staff/143692/)'s guidance. Heavily influenced by the works of [Masahito Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/138566/), [Yoshinori Kanada](https://anilist.co/staff/106398/) and [Masami Oobari](https://anilist.co/staff/100660/). Regular presence in [Toei](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s shows, specifically the [Precure](https://anilist.co/anime/100661/) franchise.

Her animation is characterized by impact frames, dark shadows, thick outlines, and overly expressive hands.

Also a die-hard fan of insects.
